mapper.insert:
SELECT ACTOR_SEQ.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into ACTOR (ACID, ACNAME, ACPHOTO, ACSORT) values (#{acid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acphoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acsort,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ACID, ACNAME, ACPHOTO, ACSORT from ACTOR ORDER BY ACID ASC
